Source code for everyclass.config.development

from .default import Config



[docs]class DevelopmentConfig(Config):
    # Basic config
    CONFIG_NAME = 'development'
    DEBUG = True
    SECRET_KEY = 'development key'
    # SERVER_NAME = 'localhost:8880'

    # CDN settings
    CDN_DOMAIN = 's2.tail0r.com'
    #CDN_DEBUG = False

    # Sentry
    SENTRY_CONFIG = {
        #'dsn': 'https://7eac20ef24f2478081bcc89c25a8472a:420fefc7e03f48b395f3728255214360@sentry.io/203385',
        # 本地开发禁用 sentry
        # 开发环境不设置 sentry release hash
    }

    # HTML minify
    HTML_MINIFY = True

    # Static file settings
    #STATIC_VERSIONED = False
    STATIC_VERSIONED = True

    # Database config
    MYSQL_CONFIG = {
        'user': 'everyclass_user',
        'password': 'everyclass_pwd',
        'host': '127.0.0.1',
        'port': '3306',
        'database': 'everyclass',
        'raise_on_warnings': True,
    }

    MYSQL_DATABASE_HOST = 'localhost'
    MYSQL_DATABASE_PORT = 3306
    MYSQL_DATABASE_USER = 'everyclass_user'
    MYSQL_DATABASE_PASSWORD = 'everyclass_pwd'
    MYSQL_DATABASE_DB = None

    SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI = 'mysql://everyclass_user:everyclass_pwd@localhost:3306/everyclass'
    SQLALCHEMY_COMMIT_ON_TEARDOWN = True  # 每次请求结束后都会自动提交数据库中的变动
